mapper.insert: insert into ADMINS(ADMINS_NUM, ADMINS_PW, ADMINS_NAME, ADMINS_DEPT, ADMINS_JOB, ADMINS_CONTACT, ADMINS_EMAIL, ADMINS_ID) values(#{adminNum}, #{adminPw}, #{adminName}, #{adminDept}, #{adminJob}, #{adminContact}, #{adminEmail}, #{adminId})
mapper.select: select ADMINS_NUM adminNum, ADMINS_NAME adminName, ADMINS_DEPT adminDept, ADMINS_JOB adminJob, ADMINS_CONTACT adminContact, ADMINS_EMAIL adminEmail, ADMINS_ID adminId from admins

select ADMINS_NUM adminNum, ADMINS_NAME adminName, ADMINS_DEPT adminDept, ADMINS_JOB adminJob, ADMINS_CONTACT adminContact, ADMINS_EMAIL adminEmail, ADMINS_ID adminId from admins where ADMINS_NUM=#{adminNum}
mapper.update: update admins set ADMINS_DEPT=#{adminDept}, ADMINS_JOB=#{adminJob}, ADMINS_CONTACT=#{adminContact}, ADMINS_EMAIL=#{adminEmail} where ADMINS_NUM=#{adminNum}
